Quantum PNT: The Benefits and the Business Case

23 September 2025 – 23 September 2025

Royal Institute of Navigation Institute of Physics (IOP), 37 Caledonian Road, London N1 9BU, United Kingdom

In partnership with industry leaders, the RIN is delivering this one-day conference tasked with demystifying Quantum Technologies. Quantum sensing systems are progressing from lab to market, connecting quantum developers with business leaders, integrators, and decision-makers across the PNT sector. Sessions cover quantum inertial sensors, gravity and magnetometry-based navigation, quantum clocks, entangled time transfer, readiness for field deployment, and the evolving industrial and defence context. The day clarifies the business case, moves beyond the hype, and supports commercial and technical readiness across the PNT community.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
